typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Unlock time should be in the future"

arguments.value: Unlock time should be in the future

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Unlock time should be in the future"

documentation.text:
@title StreakTracker
 @notice Records and retrieves consecutive daily streaks per user.
@dev Returns the current day index since Unix epoch.
@notice Records today’s action and updates the user’s streak.
@notice Returns the last day index on which `user` recorded an action.

arguments.value: Unlock time should be in the fut
